titleStmt.title: Liste de provisions d'huile, de vin, etc

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Recto: List of the (items) of the stratelates, as follows: kollathon-jars 130, Askalonion jars, 30, of oil, quarts, 3, and from Epitygchanon, 3, makes 6 (quarts); and from the lord Strategius, quarts, 6; and from Abraamios, of oil, kollathon-jars 3, quarts 16, makes together 19 (jars); and Gaza-type jars of wine, 39; and through Menas, servant, of goëth() (?), 1 magarikon and 2 small amphoras; and from Abraamios, 1 Askalonian jar of mixed snacks, 1 Gaza-type jar of halec / alix, 1 Gaza-type jar of walnuts, 1 large lagynion-jar of pharnasi-- and 2 small ones. Verso: ----- of pharna -- 1 omogarikion, of mixed (snacks), 3 (omogarikia), (of the same), small amphoras 4; and of various snacks, Askalonian jars [x] and Gaza-type jars [x]; and from Epitygchanon of snacks, Gaza-type jars [x], small amphoras [x]; The items which went into the ship --, as follows: 130 kollatha and 30 Askalonian jars, of oil, 29 jars; of wine, 39 Gaza-type jars; of snacks, 15 Gaza-type jars and 5 Askalonian jars, 5 omogarikia, 6 small amphoras.

listBibl.bibl: P. Got. 17 Kruit, N., Worp, K. A., P.Got. 17 re-edited, Eranos 101, 2, 2003, p. 114-119 Bell, H. Jahrgang, 1930, c. 237-8, 240; Wilcken, U., Urkunden-Referat, Archiv für Papyrusforschung 9, 1930, p. 250; BL II 2, 70 (recto: lines 6, 22; verso: lines 2-3); BL III, 69 (verso: lines 2-3); BL VI, 44 (verso: lines 2-3), 45 (recto: 18, 20); BL XII 79 (recto: lines 16, 21); TM 36145
